Subject: Invitation to Join Our Live Episode on Sustainable Cities

Hi Dr. Alvarez,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Urban Futures" podcast. Our upcoming live‑audience episode, *Future of Sustainable Cities – Live Audience Discussion*, will explore cutting‑edge strategies for resilient urban design, and we’d love to feature you as a guest.

Your work on resilient infrastructure and your dynamic TEDx talks perfectly align with both our audience’s interests (urban planning, sustainable design, green infrastructure) and the interactive format of the show. We believe your expertise and engaging stage presence would make for an unforgettable live conversation.

The episode is scheduled for **Thursday, March 21st at 7 PM PT**, streamed from our studio in San Francisco with a live audience of 200+ urban‑design professionals and enthusiasts. We’ll handle all logistics, and you’ll have a brief rehearsal slot to get comfortable with the setup.

Would you be available to join us? I’m happy to work around your schedule and can provide any additional details you need.

Looking forward to the possibility of having you on the show!

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Urban Futures Podcast
alex@urbanfuturespod.com
+1 (555) 123‑4567
